title: Zondo commission: Focus back on Vrede dairy farm project
text:
WATCH LIVE | Zondo commission: Focus back on Vrede dairy farm project

28 October, 12:10 PM

Peter Thabethe, former Free State Department of Agriculture head is expected back in the hot seat at the Zondo commission of inquiry into state capture on Monday.

He will continue his testimony on the Vrede dairy farm project.



During his last appearance, Thabethe was unable to fully explain why he had allowed R29m to be removed from an account in the Estina dairy farm project before a full feasibility study could be completed, News24 reported.
description:
Peter Thabethe, former Free State Department of Agriculture head is expected back in the hot seat at the Zondo commission of inquiry into state capture on Monday.

He will continue his testimony on the Vrede dairy farm project.
